title: Under the Strictly glitterball with Michelle Visage: 'Look what happened in the American presidency. You gotta vote. I beg of you!'
text:
The RuPaul Drag Race judge talks about problems with posture, channelling Liza Minnelli and feeling like a French fry

Well one thing is for sure, there's no rest for the wicked! After an eight-hour rehearsal on Wednesday, I was up at 4am on Thursday to appear on Good Morning Britain to talk about the UK version of RuPaul ’s Drag Race, which kicked off on the BBC this week. It’s such a brilliant, beautiful show and I hope everyone enjoys it. Now that that gorgeous premiere has happened, it’s all about the Quickstep, which is our dance on Strictly for Movie Week.

Doing two ballroom dances in a row definitely helps to work on and improve my posture and frame. I loved our Viennese Waltz last week....
description: The RuPaul Drag Race judge talks about problems with posture, channelling Liza Minnelli and feeling like a French fry
